description: A Maltese style soup with grains and root veg with a salty goats cheese and runny egg.
name: Kasksu with Cheese & Egg Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium white onion, peeled and chopped
1 large potato, peeled and cut into chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a large saucepan to a medium heat and add the canola oil.
Add the onion and garlic to the pan and fry for 3 minutes.
Add the vegetable stock and potato to the pot and allow to simmer for 10 minutes.
Add the couscous, peas and tomato paste to the pot and allow to simmer for a further 10 minutes.
Lastly add the crumbled cheese and then crack the eggs on top, season with pepper. Cover the pot, allow to sit for 15 minutes and then serve.
